update agt_emp_info set PINDEX = #{pindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AVATAR_ID = #{avatarId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFICE_ID = #{officeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS_TIME = #{statusTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_IDENTITY = #{createUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY = #{modifyUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_FLG = #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from agt_emp_info
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM AGT_EMP_INFO WHERE STATUS = 0 AND USER_ID=#{value} AND DELETE_FLG = 0
SELECT count(id) as cnt FROM con_contract_tp WHERE `STATUS` NOT IN (5,6,7,11) AND (eid = #{eId} OR beid = #{eId})

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HOU_HOUSE_INFO h LEFT JOIN hou_lease_info l ON h.id = l.HID WHERE h.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND l.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND h.ACTIVE_STATUS != 2 AND h.LOCK_STATUS != 1 AND h.AUDIT_STATUS = 2 AND l.RELEASE_STATUS = 1 AND h.BEID = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(H.ID) FROM HOU_HOUSE_INFO H RIGHT JOIN CON_CONTRACT C ON C.HID = H.ID WHERE H.BEID = #{value} AND H.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND C.DELETE_FLG = 0
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM HOU_HOUSE_INFO WHERE BEID = #{value} AND DELETE_FLG = 0 AND AUDIT_STATUS = 1
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM HOU_HOUSE_INFO WHERE BEID = #{value} AND DELETE_FLG = 0 AND AUDIT_STATUS = 3
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM AGT_CUS_INFO WHERE EID = #{value} AND DELETE_FLG = 0
SELECT COUNT(C.ID) FROM CON_CONTRACT C WHERE BEID = #{id} AND DELETE_FLG = 0 AND C.ID NOT IN (SELECT DEL_ID FROM USR_DEL_INFO WHERE UEP_ID = #{userId})

SELECT COUNT(C.ID) FROM CON_CONTRACT C
WHERE BEID = #{id} AND DELETE_FLG = 0 AND (TO_DAYS(END_TIME) - TO_DAYS( NOW( ))) <= 30
AND C.ID NOT IN (SELECT DEL_ID FROM USR_DEL_INFO WHERE UEP_ID = #{userId})
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM AGT_EMP_INFO WHERE OFFICE_ID = #{value} AND DELETE_FLG = 0
SELECT ID FROM AGT_COMP_INFO WHERE OFFICE_ID = #{value} AND DELETE_FLG = 0
SELECT COUNT(A.ID) FROM AGT_EMP_INFO A,AGT_COMP_INFO C WHERE A.COMPANY_ID = C.ID AND C.LOCK_FLAG = 1 AND A.USER_ID = #{value} AND A.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND A.`STATUS` = 0 AND C.DELETE_FLG = 0
SELECT COUNT(S.ID) FROM SYS_USER S WHERE S.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND S.LOGIN_FLAG = 2 AND S.ID = #{value}
SELECT * FROM agt_emp_info WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND DELETE_FLG = 0 AND STATUS = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE agt_emp_info SET PHONE = #{phone} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND DELETE_FLG = 0 AND STATUS = 0
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM agt_emp_info WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND DELETE_FLG=0 AND STATUS=0
